meanings.definition: A pattern of parallel lines in a V-shape
meanings.sent1: The floor was covered in a beautiful herringboning design.
meanings.sent2: The jacket featured a classic herringboning weave.
meanings.sent3: The cat left a trail of herringboning footprints in the sand.
meanings.sent4: The cars on the highway moved in a herringboning formation.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight created a herringboning shadow on the wall.

meanings.definition: To arrange in a herringbone pattern
meanings.sent1: She was herringboning the tiles on the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter was herringboning the pieces of wood together.
meanings.sent3: The chef herringboned the vegetables on the cutting board.
meanings.sent4: The gardener herringboned the plants in the garden bed.
meanings.sent5: He was herringboning the threads to create a unique fabric pattern.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a herringbone pattern
meanings.sent1: Her herringboning of the fabric was meticulous and precise.
meanings.sent2: The artist's herringboning of the colors created a stunning effect.
meanings.sent3: The team's herringboning of the bricks in the wall was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The tailor's herringboning of the seams showed great skill.
meanings.sent5: The designer's herringboning of the runway set the stage for the show.
